mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed ( location, ctnt, iuser ) VALUES ( #{location}, #{ctnt}, ${iuser} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.ifeed, A.location, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.regdt , C.nm AS writer, C.mainimg , IFNULL(E.cnt, 0) AS favCnt
, CASE WHEN D.ifeed IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isFav
FROM t_feed A INNER JOIN t_user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser
AND C.iuser = ${iuserForMyFeed}
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifeed, COUNT(ifeed) AS cnt FROM t_feed_fav GROUP BY ifeed ) E ON A.ifeed = E.ifeed
LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav D ON D.iuser = ${iuserForFav} AND A.ifeed = D.ifeed
ORDER BY A.ifeed DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed_img ( ifeed, img ) VALUES ( ${ifeed}, #{img} )
mapper.select: SELECT img FROM t_feed_img WHERE ifeed = #{ifeed}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed_fav ( ifeed, iuser ) VALUES ( #{ifeed}, #{iuser} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, COUNT(A.icmt) - 1 AS isMore FROM ( SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdt, A.ifeed , B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainimg as writerimg FROM t_feed_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ifeed = ${ifeed} ORDER BY icmt ASC LIMIT 2 ) A GROUP BY A.ifeed
SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdt , B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainimg as writerimg FROM t_feed_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ifeed = ${ifeed} ORDER BY icmt ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed_cmt ( ifeed, iuser, cmt ) VALUES ( ${ifeed}, ${iuser}, #{cmt} )
